name: Meditiation for Beginners + CD
description:
Slightly scuffed cover sleeve so massively reduced price! Paid $35 from the book store ! Book is otherwise NEW with unopened CD included

The tradition of resting in the silence of an undistracted mind is thousands of years old. It is practiced by seekers in all of the world's spiritual traditions, as well as in hospitals and even corporate board rooms. Now, with Meditation for Beginners, acclaimed author and respected meditation teacher Jack Kornfield shares the essential teachings and guided practices that you would learn at an intensive beginner's meditation retreat in this concise, interactive course. If you have never meditated before, you will find. Meditation for Beginners a highly accesible doorway into this proven, transformative practice.

name: No BS Wealth Attraction for Entrepreneurs NEW
description:
$24.95 from the bookshop

Read this book and in just a few months make more money than you have in years. Sound unbelievable? That's Dan Kennedy's speciality. Dan "Millionaire Maker" Kennedy has helped many thousands of entrepreneurs create "the wealth surge experience."

By making a few calculated changes, you'll attract more opportunity and money than you ever dreamed possible. That's right--attract--not create, not develop, not identify, but become an opportunity magnet. These eleven breakthrough strategies turn your business into a springboard to unimaginable riches. Eliminate ingrained "wealth-blocking" thinking with hard-nosed, practical tactics for organising, marketing and managing a business for maximum profit.

name: Be Bold - Discover the Power of Praise NEW
description: Using Susan's own experiences and those of the many self-determining people she has met and interviewed over the years, she eloquently explores what happens when people receive due acknowledgment - and what happens when they don't.Now, more than ever, in this post-September 11 world, we have a clear choice. Do we move forwards or backwards? Do we dare to have a bold vision of how we would like the world to be or a predictable plan for retribution? As voters we need to ask ourselves, who has the boldest vision for our future? Is it a bold vision of light and moving forward or is it a vision of darkness and destruction and moving back to where we were before September 11, 2001? Using Susan's own experiences and those of the many self-determining people she has met and interviewed over the years, she eloquently explores what happens when people receive due acknowledgement - and what happens when they don't.Now, more than ever, in this post-September 11 world, we have a clear choice. Do we move forwards or backwards? Do we dare to have a bold vision of how we would like the world to be or a predictable plan for retribution? As voters we need to ask ourselves, who has the boldest vision for our future? Is it a bold vision of light and moving forward or is it a vision of darkness and destruction and moving back to where we were before September 11, 2001?

name: The Green Consumer Guide
description:
From Hairspray to hamburgers - shopping for a better environment.
John Elkington and Julia Hailes with CHOICE magazine and the Australian Conservation Foundation.

$20 new from the book store. On sale because of it's age (1988) but one of the fundamental books in the living green movement. Goes through clearly and easily with facts and knowledge of how to live better. Still in good condition.

name: The God Delusion - Richard Dawkins
description:
Over 2 million copies sold ! $27.95 NEW in the bookshop. 
This book is in perfect condition.

In The God Delusion, Dawkins contends that a supernatural creator  almost certainly does not exist and that belief in a personal god qualifies as a delusion, which he defines as a persistent false belief held in the face of strong contradictory evidence. He is sympathetic to Robert Pirsig's statement in Lila that "when one person suffers from a delusion it is called insanity. When many people suffer from a delusion it is called religion."
